summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 1.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 7299 lux) and cloud levels (up 335 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 6633 lux), and cloud levels (up 159 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and light winds will prevail. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and bright intervals likely. Little change in the weather.
